title: Fairies, Princes and Fairy Princes
description: Fairies, princes, kings, quests, impossible tasks, curses, true love, mermen, witches, a talking invisible bear; everything you'd expect from a book of fairy tales--everything but the princesses, that is.Fairies, Princes and Fairy Princes is a collection of a dozen lesser-known classic fairy tales rewritten to contain gentle gay romance, clever wit and a warm fuzzy feeling.Contains the following stories:The Fair One with Locks of GoldThe Doll in the GrassEast o'the Sun, West o'the MoonEspin and the KingThe Fairy and the WitchFairy LightsThe Entangled MermanEspin and the North WindThe Fish and the RingThe Prince on the Glass HillOne-Eye, Two-Eyes and Three-EyesThe Fairy Queen's Belt
author: A.R. Jarvis
